name: NOSEDIVE
description:
NOSEDIVE is a procedural flight game through a sci-fi city. Dodge ships and buildings all the while keeping your speed to earn more points.

This game was made during the 2019 Epic Mega Jam. All assets excluding audio were created during jam time.

Menu wind: from Soundly.

Music: Bits by MossBafia (c) copyright 2016 Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution (3.0) license. http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/MossBafia/54316
